hizbs.text: wa-amma alladhina suʿidu fafi l-janati khalidina fiha ma damati l-samawatu wal-ardu illa ma shaa rabbuka ʿataan ghayra majdhudhin
fala taku fi mir'yatin mimma yaʿbudu haulai ma yaʿbuduna illa kama yaʿbudu abauhum min qablu wa-inna lamuwaffuhum nasibahum ghayra manqusin
walaqad atayna musa l-kitaba fa-ukh'tulifa fihi walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafi shakkin min'hu muribin
wa-inna kullan lamma layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aʿmalahum innahu bima yaʿmaluna khabirun
fa-is'taqim kama umir'ta waman taba maʿaka wala tatghaw innahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
wala tarkanu ila alladhina zalamu fatamassakumu l-naru wama lakum min duni l-lahi min awliyaa thumma la tunsaruna
wa-aqimi l-salata tarafayi l-nahari wazulafan mina al-layli inna l-hasanati yudh'hib'na l-sayiati dhalika dhik'ra lildhakirina
wa-is'bir fa-inna l-laha la yudiʿu ajra l-muh'sinina
falawla kana mina l-quruni min qablikum ulu baqiyyatin yanhawna ʿani l-fasadi fi l-ardi illa qalilan mimman anjayna min'hum wa-ittabaʿa alladhina zalamu ma ut'rifu fihi wakanu muj'rimina
wama kana rabbuka liyuh'lika l-qura bizul'min wa-ahluha mus'lihuna
walaw shaa rabbuka lajaʿala l-nasa ummatan wahidatan wala yazaluna mukh'talifina
illa man rahima rabbuka walidhalika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina l-jinati wal-nasi ajmaʿina
wakullan naqussu ʿalayka min anbai l-rusuli ma nuthabbitu bihi fuadaka wajaaka fi hadhihi l-haqu wamawʿizatun wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
waqul lilladhina la yu'minuna iʿ'malu ʿala makanatikum inna ʿamiluna
wa-intaziru inna muntaziruna
walillahi ghaybu l-samawati wal-ardi wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿu l-amru kulluhu fa-uʿ'bud'hu watawakkal ʿalayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin ʿamma taʿmaluna
alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu l-kitabi l-mubini
inna anzalnahu qur'anan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqiluna
nahnu naqussu ʿalayka ahsana l-qasasi bima awhayna ilayka hadha l-qur'ana wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina l-ghafilina
idh qala yusufu li-abihi yaabati inni ra-aytu ahada ʿashara kawkaban wal-shamsa wal-qamara ra-aytuhum li sajidina
qala yabunayya la taqsus ru'yaka ʿala ikh'watika fayakidu laka kaydan inna l-shaytana lil'insani ʿaduwwun mubinun

wakadhalika yajtabika rabbuka wayuʿallimuka min tawili l-ahadithi wayutimmu niʿ'matahu ʿalayka waʿala ali yaʿquba kama atammaha ʿala abawayka min qablu ib'rahima wa-is'haqa inna rabbaka ʿalimun hakimun
